analysis.description:
e2pAirEscrow.withdraw (/unique_chucks/6/0xc393c68c4ea806af0f2432530f34daf4a3f67860.sol#421-465) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferFrom(AIRDROPPER,_recipient,CLAIM_AMOUNT) (/unique_chucks/6/0xc393c68c4ea806af0f2432530f34daf4a3f67860.sol#450-454)
	-token.transferFrom(AIRDROPPER,_referralAddress,REFERRAL_AMOUNT) (/unique_chucks/6/0xc393c68c4ea806af0f2432530f34daf4a3f67860.sol#458-459)
